title: KBC 17: Amitabh Bachchan jokes AI might replace him as host
description: In the latest episode of 'Kaun Banega Crorepati' 17, Amitabh Bachchan stated his concern that artificial intelligence is being used for many tasks and expressed fear of being replaced as host.

title: AI is causing an investing frenzy, but will the bubble burst?
description: Investors are increasingly nervous the artificial intelligence “frenzy” is hugely over-inflating tech company valuations. Here's the lowdown
content:
Investors are increasingly nervous the artificial intelligence “frenzy” is massively over-inflating tech company valuations, prompting fears of a bubble.

title: Exclusive: Google planning powerful AI data centre on tiny Australian Indian Ocean outpost
description: Google plans to build a large artificial intelligence data centre on Australia's remote Indian Ocean outpost of Christmas Island after signing a cloud deal with the Department of Defence earlier this year, according to documents reviewed by Reuters and interviews with officials.
content: SYDNEY, Nov 6 (Reuters) - Google plans to build a large artificial intelligence data centre on Australia's remote Indian Ocean outpost of Christmas Island after signing a cloud deal with the Department of Defence earlier this year, according to docum... [4549 chars]

title: AI-generated disinformation tactics spotted ahead of COP30
description: WASHINGTON, D.C. — A clip said to show massive flooding in the Amazonian city hosting the UN climate summit is just one widely-shared example of how disinformation, cheaply created by artificial intelligence and circulating on social media, is influencing perceptions of COP30.
